articles.author: Anand Krishnamoorthy, Toby Alder
articles.title: Stocks Set for Mixed Open, OPEC+ to Pause Hikes: Markets Wrap - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: US equity-index futures advanced Monday, suggesting that the seven-month rally in global stocks may still have room to run as strong tech earnings and easing US–China trade tensions lift sentiment.
articles.content:
US equity-index futures advanced Monday, suggesting that the seven-month rally in global stocks may still have room to run as strong tech earnings and easing USChina trade tensions lift sentiment.
